name: dumbterm
description: A stupidly simple web-based terminal emulator.

scripts.copy-xterm: mkdir -p public/node_modules/@xterm public/node_modules/@fontsource && cp -r node_modules/@xterm/xterm node_modules/@xterm/addon-* public/node_modules/@xterm/ && cp -r node_modules/@fontsource/jetbrains-mono public/node_modules/@fontsource/
